channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These Anti-Meta Smart Glasses Are Controlled by a Health-Tracking Smart Ring
item.description: The new Even Realities Even G2 smart glasses don't have speakers or a camera, but do come with smart ring.

item.title: Test du Hisense HT Saturn : et si le vrai home-cinéma sans fil ne venait pas de Sony ni de Samsung ?
item.description: Avec son architecture quadriphonique et sa configuration sans fil, le Hisense HT Saturn promet une immersion sonore à 360 degrés dans une formule compacte et ultra simple à installer. Misant sur la collaboration avec Devialet pour le réglage acoustique, ce système 4.1.2 veut proposer des effets Atmos spectaculaires, le tout à un prix maîtrisé. En voici notre test complet. ...

item.title: La montre OnePlus Watch 3, avec ses 5 jours d’autonomie, est 200 € moins chère à l’occasion du Singles Day
item.description: OnePlus remet les pendules à l’heure avec une nouvelle mouture de sa montre connectée. Après une Watch 2 déjà solide, la marque chinoise affine son approche avec une couronne rotative bien pensée, et un écran plus large. Les Singles Day font tomber son prix de 349 euros à 151,46 euros sur AliExpress.

item.title: That Black Hole Merger That ‘Shouldn’t’ Exist’? Scientists Propose a Wild Explanation
item.description: The black hole was bigger than expected, and while the answer was hiding in plain sight, it still rewrites what we thought was possible.

item.title: Hollywood Is Closing the Book on ‘Jumanji’ (Again)
item.description: Dwayne Johnson announced that his third 'Jumanji' film—the fourth overall in the franchise—will be the last.

item.title: Get serious about your homes air quality with $200 off the Dyson Purifier Big + Quiet
item.description: As of Nov. 12, get the Dyson Purifier Big + Quiet for $200 off at Amazon.

item.title: The Bose Ultra Headphones just hit a record-low early Black Friday price, and I’d choose them over the Sony WH-1000XM6 – here’s why
item.description: Top-tier noise cancellation, $100 cheaper price than Sony's or Bose's own updated model

item.title: Aqara’s cord-free presence sensor runs for up to three years on battery power
item.description: Aqara has announced its first battery-powered presence sensor, which can be installed nearly anywhere in your home to automate smart devices as your family comes and goes. Instead of having to hide a cord and plan its location around a power source, a pair of CR2450 coin cell batteries powers the Presence Multi-Sensor FP300 for […]

item.title: YouTube TV’s Disney blackout is ruining my life (I can’t watch ‘Jeopardy!’)
item.description: For 12 days and counting, Disney-owned channels like ESPN and ABC have been blacked out on YouTube TV.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Extra et Premium en novembre 2025 : voici les jeux offerts pour les abonnés, dont le dernier GTA
item.description: Ce sera la der des der avant GTA 6 ! Ce mois-ci, les abonnés Extra et Premium du PlayStation Plus pourront profiter gratuitement de GTA 5, mais aussi de ces quelques jeux dont deux survival-horror pour celles et ceux qui veulent rester dans l'ambiance de Halloween.

item.title: Anthropic will invest $50 billion in building AI data centers in the US
item.description: Anthropic just announced plans to put $50 billion toward bolstering computing infrastructure in the US. As part of the initiative, the company is working with the AI cloud platform Fluidstack to build datacenters in Texas and New York, “with more sites to come.” The data centers will come online throughout 2026 and create 800 jobs, […]

item.title: Paramount+ is about cost more, but you can still save on a subscription — heres how
item.description: Paramount+ is raising prices in January 2026. Here are the best Paramount+ streaming deals to help you save on a subscription.

item.title: Pré Black Friday : plein phare sur les offres PC portables incontournables (MacBook, Galaxy Book, IdeaPad, MSI…)
item.description: PC ultraportable ou gaming ? Processeur Intel ou AMD ? Carte graphique puissante ou portabilité ? On a l'embarras du choix pendant cette période pré-Black Friday. Les configurations des plus grands constructeurs du marché tels que Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI sont proposées avec des grosses réductions.

item.title: Why a researcher is building robots that look and act like bats
item.description: These palm-sized robots use ultrasound signals to navigate harsh conditions in search and rescue missions.

item.title: I'm a certified barista, and I've hand-picked all of today's best early Black Friday deals on De'Longhi coffee machines
item.description: Five-star espresso machines have dropped to record-low prices ahead of Black Friday, so why wait?

item.title: Amazon is cracking down on illegal streaming on its Fire TV Stick
item.description: Amazon says it is blocking apps that allow users to illegally stream content on its Fire TV Stick, according to reporting by The Athletic. The clampdown will apply to new and old devices and it’s already begun in France and Germany, with a global rollout set for the next weeks and months. The Fire TV […]

item.title: La période du Black Friday regorge déjà de bons plans : voici le TOP des meilleures offres en DIRECT
item.description: Avant le coup d'envoi officiel du vendredi noir à la fin du mois, les offres se multiplient et deviennent de plus en plus intéressantes. D'un côté, il y a le pré-Black Friday chez la majorité des e-commerçants français comme Boulanger, Fnac Darty, Amazon et Cdiscount, et de l'autre côté, il y a aussi le Singles Day, ou 11.11, chez AliExpress et consorts. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres des deux événements dans cet article. ...

item.title: How video editing in news has changed in Trump’s media world
item.description: As his BBC and ’60 Minutes’ lawsuits show, questioning edits is another tool for the president to strike back at journalists who displease him. In the space of a few months, a journalistic skill that might seem straightforward to many viewers—editing tape for broadcast—has been behind a $16 million legal settlement, a network’s change in how it offers interviews on a news show, and now, the resignation of two top leaders at the BBC....

item.title: Google’s Private AI Compute will let users securely run even the most powerful AI models on your smartphone
item.description: Private AI Compute aims to be the perfect middle ground between on-device and high-risk cloud.

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 (2025) Review: Finally, Mobile Gaming With Desktop Modularity
item.description: The 2025 version of the modular and repairable 16-inch laptop now has the GPU power for AAA gaming.

item.title: The AI Boom Is Fueling a Need for Speed in Chip Networking
item.description: Next-gen networking tech, sometimes powered by light instead of electricity, is emerging as a critical piece of AI infrastructure.

item.title: Productivity app Hero announces an SDK that will complete your AI prompts for you
item.description: The autocomplete will help users create more effective prompts for AI apps, resulting in fewer back-and-forths.

item.title: Ubisoft continues its partnership with mental health charity Safe In Our World with new Good Game Playbooks to promote positive online play and protect from disruptive behaviour
item.description: Ubisoft has announced new editions of its Good Game Playbooks to promote positive play in young gamers.

item.title: Radio streamer TuneIn acquired for $175M
item.description: Radio streamer TuneIn sold for $175M, down from its earlier valuation of $500M.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge might disappear next year, so grab this record-low Black Friday price while you still can
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is rumored to be replaced by a regular Galaxy S26 Plus next year, so this fantastic Amazon Black Friday deal could be a good buy while you have the chance.

item.title: Dans sa lutte contre le DMA, Apple se pose en défenseur des consommateurs
item.description: Dans sa bataille contre le DMA, Apple essaie maintenant de se mettre les consommateurs européens dans la poche. Selon une étude commandée par le constructeur, les développeurs gardent pour eux les économies réalisées grâce à la baisse des commissions, sans en faire profiter les utilisateurs. Mais les choses sont-elles aussi simples ?

item.title: The Feds Couldn’t Stop New Glenn From Launching, But This Solar Storm Sure Did
item.description: The impending arrival of another coronal mass ejection upended Blue Origin’s New Glenn launch on Wednesday.

item.title: Amazon is packed with early Black Friday deals from tech to toys
item.description: The Amazon early Black Friday sale has deals on Apple, Bose, Lego, Samsung, and plenty more.

item.title: Headphone (1) : Amazon baisse le prix du casque premium de Nothing en ce pré-Black Friday
item.description: Avec le Headphone (1), Nothing se frotte à la catégorie des casques premium, que vous pouvez avoir pour 252,76 euros au lieu de 299 euros.

item.title: Future electricity demand needs more diverse and resilient energy production, IEA report says
item.description: The IEA says building greater resilience in energy systems is especially important as data centers, heating and cooling, electrification, and more drive energy demand. Electricity demand will rise much faster than overall energy growth in the coming decades, underscoring the need for diversified energy sources, according to an analysis released Wednesday....

item.title: Coca-Cola just gave this old-school soda brand a DGAF makeover
item.description: Watch out, Dr. Pepper. Watch out, Dr. Pepper: Mr. Pibb is in the house.

item.title: Data centers now attract more investment than than finding new oil supplies
item.description: In a shift, the world will spend $40 billion more on new data centers this year than it will on finding new sources of oil.

item.title: Prime Video ad tier breaks astonishing new subscriber record – but I’m close to cancelling the Amazon service
item.description: Prime Video has announced how many subscribers its ad-supported tier is reaching, but they might just be losing one.

item.title: Quels sont les smartphones disposant encore d’une prise casque (jack) en 2025 ?
item.description: Depuis plusieurs années, la prise jack de nos téléphones se fait de plus en plus rare. Maintenant régulièrement remplacée par la connexion sans fil Bluetooth, elle reste cependant présente sur un nombre restreint de modèles : voici notre sélection des meilleurs smartphones avec prise jack.

item.title: Lawmakers warn Democratic governors that states are sharing drivers’ data with ICE
item.description: A group of Democratic lawmakers asked governors in California, Colorado, and other states to block ICE from accessing their residents’ driver’s license data without their knowledge.

item.title: Pré Black Friday : le meilleur des offres TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Le téléviseur du salon montre des signes de fatigue ? Couleurs ternes, son grésillant, image vieillissante ? C’est sans doute le moment de le remplacer. À l’approche du Black Friday, de nombreuses TV 4K et vidéoprojecteurs sont proposés à prix réduit. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres du moment pour allier qualité d’image et bon rapport qualité-prix. ...

item.title: Bob Ross paintings sell for more than $600K at auction, giving a lifeline to public TV stations
item.description: All profits from the sale are pledged to TV stations that use content from distributor American Public Television. Three paintings from famously chill public television legend Bob Ross sold Tuesday for more than $600,000 at auction. The paintings were the first of 30 Ross works being sold to benefit public TV stations hurt by cuts in federal funding.At the live auction at Bonhams in Los Angeles, a serene, snow vista called “Winter’s Peace” that Ross painted entirely during a 1993 episode of “The Joy of Painting” went for $318,000 to a bidder on the phone.“For a good cause — and you get the pai...

item.title: Le prix des cartes graphiques vous décourage ? Le tarif des Nvidia RTX 50 est en chute pour le Black Friday [Sponso]
item.description: PcComponentes aborde la période du Black Friday sous le signe de l’agressivité, avec des tarifs rabotés sur la plupart des cartes graphiques de son catalogue, dont les très recherchés GPU Nvidia de dernière génération.

item.title: Air travel chaos will linger long after the government reopens
item.description: The longest government shutdown in the nation's history may soon be over. Once it is, federal museums and monuments will reopen. SNAP payments will start flowing again. And tens of thousands of essential federal employees, including air traffic controllers, will get paid for the first time since October. But air travel won't go back to […]

item.title: Ozempic’s Surprise Side Effect? Maybe Surviving Cancer
item.description: New research suggests that people taking GLP-1 therapy are less likely to die from colorectal cancer.

item.title: The Best Black Friday FlexiSpot deals to turn your home office into your personal haven
item.description: Standing desks and chairs are home office essentials - but they don't come cheap ... until now!

It used to be that 55 inches was the biggest OLED TV you could typically buy without passing the $1K threshold. But, despite this being a year marked by rising tech prices and tariffs, you […]

item.title: Is it worth subscribing to Norton VPN now? See how its deal stacks up against the best of Black Friday so far
item.description: Still a couple of weeks out from Black Friday itself, our exclusive Norton VPN deal competes very well indeed against seasonal discounts from other providers.

item.title: Apple launches Digital ID for Apple Wallet
item.description: Apple has launched Digital ID, a way to securely present an ID with Apple Wallet.

item.title: Apple launches Digital ID, a way to carry your passport on your phone for use at TSA checkpoints
item.description: Apple's new Digital ID will let U.S. users carry their passport on their iPhone, and use it at TSA checkpoints.

item.title: Centres de données | Anthropic va investir 50 milliards de dollars
item.description: La start-up américaine d’intelligence artificielle (IA) Anthropic a annoncé mercredi son intention d’investir 50 milliards de dollars dans la construction de centres de données, par le biais d’un partenariat avec le spécialiste britannique de l’informatique à distance (cloud) Fluidstack.

item.title: Arc Raiders is a perfect mix of tension, drama, and genuinely human moments - it might just be the best game of 2025
item.description: Arc Raiders is one of the best games of the year, and one of the best multiplayer experiences you will ever play.

item.title: CD Projekt Red’s The Witcher in Concert proved the perfect way to ramp up my hype for The Witcher 4 – and also showed the faltering PlayStation in Concert how it's done
item.description: Simplicity in its show, and amazing in its audio – how the Witcher in Concert was the best video game music of 2025, easily seeing off the faltering PlayStation concert.

item.title: Want to photograph the northern lights tonight? Here’s how to plan your trip and the best settings to use
item.description: Scientists predict the sun is entering a long-term phase of heightened activity, and today is supposedly another chance to see the northern lights.

item.title: People Can’t Tell If a Song Is AI-Generated, and That’s Why It’s Going to Be Inescapable
item.description: AI videos move aside, there is new eerily realistic slop in town.

item.title: Privacy fears drive VPN boom as Italy enforces mandatory age verification
item.description: VPN demand in Italy doubled on the first day of mandatory age verification, as internet users are turning to VPNs to evade checks.

item.title: WordPress users beware - GootLoader strikes again, using font hack to spread malware
item.description: In some cases the attackers reached domain controllers within hours.

item.title: 97 % des auditeurs sont incapables de distinguer une chanson IA d’un vrai morceau
item.description: Pratiquement personne ne peut faire la différence entre une chanson générée par IA et un morceau réalisé par des humains. Un sondage de Deezer indique aussi que plus de la moitié des auditeurs se sentent mal à l'aise avec l'idée de ne pas pouvoir distinguer les deux.

item.title: Roomba en crise : iRobot lutte pour sa survie dans un marché qui a changé de visage
item.description: Roomba, ça vous parle ? Ce petit disque qui glisse tout seul sous la table, popularisé par iRobot, s’est rendu indispensable dans pas mal de foyers. Mais derrière l’image du robot autonome, le constructeur se débat pour sa survie.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 : ce smartphone milieu de gamme de 2025 est à moitié prix à l’occasion du Singles Day
item.description: Le Galaxy A56 est un smartphone qui ne cherche pas à battre des records de puissance, mais plus à se trouver une place dans les poches de tout le monde, en étant fiable, assez véloce et avec un bel écran fluide. Pour les Singles Day, il passe à 234,99 euros au lieu de 499,99 euros avec un code.

item.title: Waymo’s Robotaxis Can Now Use the Highway, Speeding Up Longer Trips
item.description: The Alphabet company’s self-driving cars are opening up shop in more and more cities. Now—finally—they’re taking to the freeway.

item.title: Waymo is hitting the highway — but can it handle the speed?
item.description: Waymo is finally ready to hit the highway. Starting today, the company’s robotaxis will gradually start to include more highway trips in its routes in Phoenix, San Francisco, and Los Angeles. In addition, Waymo’s Bay Area service is extending south to San Jose, including 24/7 curbside access at both terminals of San Jose International Airport […]

item.title: AI data startup WisdomAI has raised another $50M, led by Kleiner, Nvidia
item.description: WisdomAI is offering AI-driven data analytics that can answer business questions from structured, unstructured, and even “dirty” data, meaning data not cleaned of typos or errors.

item.title: Waymo robotaxis are now giving rides on freeways in LA, San Francisco, and Phoenix
item.description: Waymo robotaxis will use freeways in Los Angeles, Phoenix, and San Francisco - an expansion that could reduce ride times by 50%.

item.description: Après plusieurs reports, Zeekr va bel et bien arriver en France en 2026. De quoi profiter de ces voitures électriques chinoises ultra-technologiques, qui viendront se frotter aux marques premium.

item.title: "This is a political deception" − New Chat Control convinces lawmakers, but not privacy experts yet
item.description: The EU Council seems to agree to the new CSAM scanning compromise "without further changes." Here's all we know.

item.title: Anthropic announces $50 billion data center plan
item.description: Anthropic has launched an ambitious new data center partnership with the U.K.-based Fluidstack, committing $50 billion to building facilities across the US.

item.title: The ultralight gummy bear power bank just got yanked from Amazon
item.description: Amazon just yanked the Haribo gummy bear power bank from its website and is canceling orders for the ultralight device. In an email sent to customers, Amazon says it has “learned of a potential safety or quality issue” regarding the power bank, and that it’s not charging customers who recently purchased it. The gummy bear […]

item.title: Sony’s New PlayStation Monitor Has a Handy Hook for Charging Your Controller
item.description: PlayStation is no longer just a console; it's now a full-fledged family of gaming gear for PC gaming.

item.title: Airbnb will let you stock the kitchen before a stay by bringing Instacart to the Airbnb app
item.description: Some Airbnb users will be able to order groceries ahead of their stay by using Instacart in the Airbnb app.

item.title: Les Galaxy S26 seraient très performants en photo, mais pas grâce à leurs capteurs
item.description: Selon une source bien renseignée, les futurs Galaxy S26 de Samsung feraient bien mieux que leurs prédécesseurs sur la partie photo. Les capteurs n'ont cependant rien à voir là-dedans.
